Welcome to CauseMap¶

CauseMap is an implementation of Convergent Cross Mapping (CCM) [1], written in Julia.

To get started right away, follow the Quickstart.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/cyrusmaher/CauseMap.jl

Also, feel free to check out the latest version of our paper!

[1]Sugihara,G. et al. (2012) Detecting causality in complex ecosystems. Science, 338, 496–500.
